text: Pellet, si a lamndike ɓe: "Ko hommbo tagi kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin?", ma ɓe wi'u: "Ko Allah". Maaku: "Yeetee lam fii ɗin ɗi rewoton gaanin Allah, si Allah faandanike lam lorra, hara ɗi huncanay lam lorra Makko kan? Maa si O faandanike lam yurmeende, taw si ɗi haɗay lam yurmeende Makko nden? Maaku: "Allah yonii lam, ko e Makko hoolnotooɓe ɓen tuuginotoo
